page.title: 03A Gloucester Farmers Day
page.content: {Manor Farm}is situated on the A 38 at Twigworth.The farm is owned by {Mr.Sivell.}The farm is 400 years old and is a mixed farm with the emphasis on dairy.There are 350 acres,divided into arable 100 acres,grassland 240 acres, barley 69,wheat 15,potatoes and oats 8 acres. There are 160 milking cows,40 Fresian heifens,50 young Herefords for beef,100 ewes,150 lambs,8 horses and 2 dogs. The farm is run by the farmer and four employees. The barley,wheat and oats are ground and fed to the cows.They eat grain in the summer and silage in the winter. When animals are taken to market young milking cows fetch Â£600,old cows Â£400, young ewes Â£60,old ewes Â£20,fat lambs Â£40.
